mapper.select: /* UserAccessDAO - accessList */ SELECT usacc_index , us_index , usacc_ip , TO_CHAR(usacc_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS usacc_date FROM (SELECT * FROM useraccess WHERE us_index = #{us_index} ORDER BY usacc_date DESC) WHERE rownum <= 20

/* UserAccessDAO - accessLast */ SELECT usacc_index , us_index , usacc_ip , TO_CHAR(usacc_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS usacc_date FROM (SELECT * FROM useraccess WHERE us_index = #{us_index} ORDER BY usacc_date DESC) WHERE rownum = 1
